Package etomica.data

Class DataSinkTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSet
      • etomica.data.DataSinkTable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataTableAverages

    public class DataSinkTable
extends DataSet
    Receives data from multiple streams and organizes it in the form of a table, with each stream of data forming a column of the table. Fires event when data in table is changed; can be configured to fire when any column of data changes, or to perform action only when all columns are changed.
